name: cosmochamp
description: Unleash the power of the cosmos elements!

scripts.dev-multi: concurrently "npm run svelte:dev" "npm run nodemon" "npm run nodemon"
scripts.out:win: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --win --config ./build/build.js --publish never
scripts.out:mac: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --mac --config ./build/build.js --publish never
scripts.publish:win: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --win --config ./build/build.js --publish always
scripts.publish:mac: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --mac --config ./build/build.js --publish always
